title: Honer,Key Fragment
body: This thing popped up that said I got a key frag. but when I looked I did not get any key frag.

replies.body: Sometimes it can take a little bit for those key frags to get placed into your inventory. It looks like you were able to forge a key out of 3 fragments recently, but let me know if you still don't see your keys!

I have finished one game and no change so far. The one key fragment I got recently was made from order coins. 
I am not too bothered about not getting one key frag, its just that I don't want this to happen later on to me and maybe others ^_^
